/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars, trucks, and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
